project.name: |-- 001-basic-threading
project.description:
Keywords:
This project includes very simple examples involving Threading.
ThreadDemo: Demonstrates how to create a simple multithreaded application as a class that extends from Thread.
ThreadDemo2: Demonstrates how to create a simple multithreaded application by creating a class that is instantiated from another class. The application is implemented as a Swing application with a single button that you can click to create a new thread.
